tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
If you are looking for a professional, experienced, ethical gynecologist and home like atmosphere, then Dr.Rashmi agarwal Clinic is the right place.

She is one of the few doctors who does not give unnecessary medicines or tests and would let things happen naturally(which works actually).

She relies on her experience *** ********* rather than checking things now and then with machines.

Me and my husband consulted her since starting of pregnancy for complete 9 months.We are very satisfied with the birth of our first child under guidance of her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was suffering from gestational diabetes and approached  to Dr. Rashmi Aggarrwal and it was awesome experience ******* ** *** **** *** ********* ********* * polite behavior at all time. If she is prescribing or suggesting anything whether it be medicines, diet or tests, explains the reason for the same too that clarifies patients doubt s n apprehension 
Under her guidance my sugar is normal I have successfully passed my 37 weeks journey of pregnancy n expecting to deliver soon.... 
I would like to recommend her other as well  n specially highly recommend to all expecting mothers....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Experience was great. She is very friendly and caring . She is so much concerned about her patient's  health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: She charged Rs.1000/ for just 10 minutes,her attitude not fill with sympathy to patient, *** *** ***** *********I visit her clinic due to experience she has,but I had disappointed,i just horrified in the pandemic time after visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I went to consult her for gynae issues. She is real good and professional. *** ** ***** *** **** ******* ** ******  She  analyze the issue thoroughly and gives great suggestions.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Rashmi is very experienced and skilled gynaecologist. Her diagnosis and treatment is really great.She is very friendly and helpful too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: she is very nice and friendly .  give very good advice about your health issues. I am very satisfied with her treatment and strongly recommend her. Thanks to be my doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is an expert in her field with an innate clinical ability. She treats her patients with due care and concern, reaches out beyond her call of duty. Truly empathetic also which is rare to find in doctors today. Her pedigree of AIIMS topping list is also something which gives me great comfort.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I had been trying to conceive for long. Dr Rashmi's  approach not only gave me hope, but well thought through and structured guidance. I got my desired result with her persistent and clinical approach. Being a consultant myself, her rationale of health, diet benefitted me even after the treatment. She truly is patient oriented and believes in holistic health treatment. In her I found a trusted mentor as well. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is nice doctor and she provide good medicines and nice treatment *** *** **** **** ********* she  is nice doctor. And my treatment is continuing from inmas with   " Dr. Rashmi Agarwal "
